China:
Yan Zhitui first referred to toilet paper.
Sui forces captured the Chen capital Jiankang and its emperor Chen Shubao.
France: Charibert II, Franco-Lombard-Byzantine war over the Po Valley. The war was stopped by breaching dam in Cucca, transferred to the Lombards by the byzantine emperor Maurice, which caused a severe flood, that bloked the franks' army advance into Italy.
